item.title: Example Tale
item.description:
Once upon a time, in a world not so different from our own, there lived a curious soul who discovered the magic of storytelling.

This was a simple example tale to show you how your Hugo site works. You can write stories of any length hereâ€”from short flash fiction to longer narratives.

To create a new tale, simply run:

hugo new tales/your-tale-name.md

Then start writing your story in the file that’s created. Your tales will automatically appear on the home page, ready to be shared with the world.
